[mandzar] :  

ğ“ˆ– mandzar â‡” [measure](measure.html)  

ğ“ˆ– | mandzar : look, sight, view Hin manzar, Per mandzar, Swa mandhari  

nadzar : sight, look Aze nezer, Hin nazar, Per nadzar, Tur nazar, Uzb nazar / nadzara : look, watch / nattara : look, watch / nadzara : look, glance Hin nazara, Per nadzare / nashada : look for / nadzara : supervision, control Aze nezaret, Per nadzarat, Tur nezaret / nadzari : theoretical Aze nezeri, Per nadzari / nadzaria : point of view /  theory Hin nazriya, Per nadzariye, Tur nazariyat
